import React from "react"; function About() { return (

About Me

Hi I'm a junior web developer based in Istanbul, Turkey.Currently employed at Uzel Bilişim as a Frontend Developer.

Ceyhun Ergün is a junior web developer based in Istanbul, Turkey. Currently employed at Uzel Bilişim as a Full Stack Developer, he specializes in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and React.js. His expertise is demonstrated through his contributions to projects like Allarmia, an alarm management platform, and Guardmon, an intelligent sensor and safety system. Ceyhun has a background in Electronic and Telecommunications, having graduated from Kocaeli University. He also gained experience as a Frontend Developer Intern at Uzel Bilişim and as a Mobile Application Developer Intern at Clockwork Agency, where he worked with React Native. Ceyhun's strengths include being a team player, creative thinker, responsible, and positive. His skills encompass UI/UX design and web/mobile application development. Ceyhun has completed "The Web Development Bootcamp," a comprehensive course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React, MongoDB, Web3, and DApps. In addition to his professional pursuits, he has a strong interest in YMs and enjoys various hobbies.

Hire Me Download CV

); } export default About;
